Maneo Refiloe Mohale bụ onye edemede, onye nchịkọta akụkọ, na onye na-ede uri na South Africa Black

Ha edeela maka akwụkwọ dị iche iche nke obodo na nke mba ụwa gụnyere Jalada, Prufrock, The Beautiful Project, The Mail & Guardian na spectrum.za. E bipụtara nchịkọta abụ mbụ ha Everything is a deathly flower na Septemba 2019 na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi uHlanga. N'afọ 2020,Edepụtara Mohale maka Ingrid Jonker Poetry Prize, na-eme ka ha bụrụ onye ikpeazụ ikpeazụ n'afọ ahụ..
A mụrụ Maneo Mohale na 1992 na Benoni, South Africa
Ha nwere nzere bachelọ nke Arts (Honours) na History na International Relations sitere na Mahadum British Columbia, Vancouver, Canada
Mgbe ha biri na Canada afọ 5, ha bi ugbu a na Johannesburg na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye edemede na onye nchịkọta akụkọ

Ọrụ Mohale na-etinye aka na isiokwu nke agbụrụ, mgbasa ozi, queerness, ịlanarị, asụsụ na akụkọ ihe mere eme. Akwụkwọ edemede ha na Mahadum nke British Columbia bụ A Dance in the Rain: Race, Resistance and Media in Apartheid South Africa. N'oge ha nọ na mahadum, e webatara Mohale na nka nka mgbe ha mebere usoro ikpo okwu ụmụ akwụkwọ n'ịntanetị akpọrọ The Talon na 2014
